attributes.action: Directly fund government money into cleaning our oceans
attributes.additional_details: I am not petitioning for a pitiful amount of money, I want a large sum that can make a global impact. We want to save this planet because it affects our future, listen to us! We need to save our planet before we can save ourselves.
attributes.background: There were billions that were given to the notre dame after it burnt down, which if given to help combat climate change, could completely clean out the ocean. As much as we appreciate history, it’s horrible to know that that is where their priorities lie. We need to make more of a stand
